com.datasalt.pangool.tuplemr.mapred
Class SortComparator

java.lang.Object
  com.datasalt.pangool.tuplemr.mapred.SortComparator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparator<ITuple>, Configurable, RawComparator<ITuple>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GroupComparator
public class SortComparator
extends Object
implements RawComparator<ITuple>, Configurable

Tuple-based MapRed job binary comparator. It decodes the binary serialization performed by TupleSerialization. Used to group tuples according to TupleMRConfigBuilder.setOrderBy(com.datasalt.pangool.tuplemr.OrderBy)

compareObjects

public int compareObjects(Object elem1,
                          Object elem2,
                          RawComparator comparator,
                          Schema.Field.Type type)
Compares two objects. Uses the given custom comparator if present. If the type is Schema.Field.Type.OBJECT and no raw comparator is present, then a binary comparator is used.
